GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of one article by given id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article's votes with given id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves comments with given article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment with given article id
